title: Material
description: A definition of how a surface is colored or shaded.

solidColor.description: A material that fills the surface with a solid color, which may be translucent.

image.description: A material that fills the surface with an image.

grid.description: A material that fills the surface with a grid.

stripe.description: A material that fills the surface with alternating colors.

checkerboard.description: A material that fills the surface with a checkerboard pattern.
